content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Client\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":60764,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2dd7d673-29f5-4ce8-ad08-dbc77d3cc975/markit1.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2dd7d673-29f5-4ce8-ad08-dbc77d3cc975/markit1.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"markit1.JPG\",\"name\":\"markit1.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"2dd7d673-29f5-4ce8-ad08-dbc77d3cc975\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":757,\"height\":470},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IHS (Information Handling Services) was founded in 1959 and has served since then customers ranging from governments and multinational companies to smaller businesses and technical professionals. In 2016 the two companies IHS and Markit merged under IHS Markit with Headquarter in London.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The company brings together the deepest intelligence across the widest set of capital-intensive industries and markets. By connecting data across variables, the analysts and industry specialists present the customers with a richer, highly integrated view of their world.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"That is the benefit of The New Intelligence.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IHS Markit is a dynamic team that includes more than 5,000 analysts, data scientists, financial experts and industry specialists. The global information expertise spans numerous industries, including leading positions in finance, energy and transportation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":70773,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0c11e6a2-9e31-4303-a195-e538ebe2fa49/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0c11e6a2-9e31-4303-a195-e538ebe2fa49/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture2.png\",\"name\":\"Picture2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0c11e6a2-9e31-4303-a195-e538ebe2fa49\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":646,\"height\":405},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":98468,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ef55d6a7-6dba-45c5-b8c8-0f9720757359/Picture3.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ef55d6a7-6dba-45c5-b8c8-0f9720757359/Picture3.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture3.png\",\"name\":\"Picture3.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ef55d6a7-6dba-45c5-b8c8-0f9720757359\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":678,\"height\":412},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(0,
